item.title: Project 3: Text Analysis with Barry's Blog
item.description: Overview Text analysis techniques generate numeric summaries of text data and apply visualization to present these summaries. This a text analysis project with Barry Pomeroy’s blog entry called My Brother’s Dinner with Andre. I used web scraping to harvest the blog entry, transformed the text into word units, then used sentiments lexicons AFINN, bing, and nrc to analyze the text. Steps are detailed below. Part 1: Text Analysis Load libraries Use the following libraries.
